mapper.insert: insert into T_USER (UUID, UNAME, LOGINAME, PASSWORD, UNIT, PHONE, DESCRIPTION) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update T_USER set UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINAME = #{loginame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UUID, UNAME, LOGINAME, PASSWORD, UNIT, PHONE, DESCRIPTION from T_USER
